This is a test email sent from your OMNEX platform.

If you received this email, your SMTP configuration is working correctly.

database.title: Database Maintenance
database.description: PostgreSQL database optimization and maintenance operations
database.optimizeDesc: Optimizes database with VACUUM ANALYZE command, cleans dead rows and updates statistics
database.vacuumDesc: Recovers unused disk space with VACUUM ANALYZE command and updates statistics for query optimization
database.analyzeDesc: Updates database statistics with ANALYZE command. Enables query planner to make better decisions
database.reindexDesc: Rebuilds all indexes with REINDEX command. May take long on large databases
database.confirmMessage: This operation will run directly on the database. Do you want to continue?
database.warning: These operations run on the main (CORE) database. Use with caution during peak hours in production environment.
database.coreDbInfo: These operations run only on the CORE database. Separate maintenance is required for tenant databases.
database.highRiskWarning: This operation may lock the database and take long. It is recommended to run it during off-peak hours in production environment.
